about_the_game:
In these streets, gangsters ain't the only thing haunting yo step. Yo punk-ass too afraid to enter da hood?

"Horror in Da Hood" is the first episodic psychological horror game in The Nightmare Chronicles franchise. This debut episode is free to play.

In The Nightmare Chronicles: Horror in Da Hood, you step into the shoes of Mason Ramirez, who is on his way to hear about a new job from the Big Boss. Unbeknownst to him, he's being watched as he makes his way through the hood. But who’s watching him... Or what, and why?

Based on true stories or sightings, The Nightmare Chronicles delves into paranormal encounters and experiences of real people, woven into a gripping fictional narrative.

Prepare yourself for a chilling journey where the streets hide more than just gangsters.

Experience the intense thrill of survival in a first-person walking and running (and screaming) simulator. Explore the gritty streets of the hood while uncovering its hidden secrets. Engage in dynamic conversations with a diverse cast of characters and navigate through eerie, atmospheric environments. Use your wits to solve puzzles, avoid deadly encounters and confront the supernatural horrors that lurk around every corner. Will you survive the night and discover the truth?

  • Atmospheric environments

  • Photo-realistic graphics

  • Conversations with NPC's

  • Thrilling storyline

  • Spine-chilling audio design

short_description: Mason is assigned a new job from the big boss when strange things start happening and he discovers the true meaning of fear... Horror in Da Hood is a gripping first-person horror game set in the hood, where the supernatural lurks around every corner. Are you brave enough to face the real terror?
